channel.description: Latest updates and news for my app.

item.title: Ultimate NEET Study Bundle 2025
item.description:
Your NEET 2025 Study Bundle is Here! üéØ

Get ready to ace your NEET exam with the most comprehensive study materials. All the resources you need in one amazing package!

  • ‚úîÔ∏è Handwritten notes
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Unacademy Modules Rankers Test
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Physics Wallah Modules
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Physics Wallah Mindmaps
  • ‚úîÔ∏è NCERT PUNCH & NCERT Exempler
  • ‚úîÔ∏è MTG Books & Med Easy
  • ‚úîÔ∏è JEE Mains 5 Years PYQs Hacks by Parthgoyal
  • ‚úîÔ∏è ALLEN Test Series & Modules
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Akash Test Series & Akash Modules 2025
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Akash Mindmaps
  • ‚úîÔ∏è 45 Days Crash Course
  • ‚úîÔ∏è 33 Years NEET PYQs
  • ‚úîÔ∏è 11 Years NEET PYQs
  • ‚úîÔ∏è And much more...

Everything you need to crack NEET 2025, now in one place! Don't miss out!

Get Your Bundle Now!

Why Choose This NEET Study Bundle?

  • ‚úîÔ∏è All-in-one solution for NEET preparation
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Mindmaps & Shortcuts for quick revision
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Detailed Previous Years' Questions for practice
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Crash Course to maximize your study time
  • ‚úîÔ∏è Trusted study materials from MTG and Med Easy
  • ‚úîÔ∏è In-depth practice with 33 Years and 11 Years of NEET PYQs

This is your opportunity to maximize your NEET preparation! Get it now!

Start Your Journey Now!

45 Days NEET Crash Course for Maximum Success

Stuck in last-minute preparation? Our 45-day crash course will help you get back on track and revise everything you need to know.

Join the Crash Course Now!

33 Years of NEET Previous Year Questions (PYQs)

Unlock the most valuable resource for NEET preparation with 33 years of previous year questions! Perfect for deep practice and concept reinforcement.

Get 33 Years PYQs Now!

11 Years of NEET Previous Year Questions (PYQs)

Consolidate your knowledge with 11 years of NEET PYQs, curated specifically for NEET aspirants like you!

Access 11 Years PYQs Now!

item.title: PYQ's for NEET and JEE
item.description:
Complete Exam List

JEE Main 2024 Misc Papers

  • JEE Main 2024 Misc Paper 1 (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 Misc Paper 2 (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 Misc Paper 3 (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 Misc Paper 4 (2024)

JEE Main 2024 (Online) Exams

  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 1st February Evening Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 1st February Morning Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 31st January Evening Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 31st January Morning Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 30th January Evening Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 30th January Morning Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 29th January Evening Shift (2024)
  • JEE Main 2024 (Online) 29th January Morning Shift (2024)

JEE Advanced 2023-2014

  • JEE Advanced 2023 Paper 2 Online (2023)
  • JEE Advanced 2023 Paper 1 Online (2023)
  • JEE Advanced 2022 Paper 2 Online (2022)
  • JEE Advanced 2022 Paper 1 Online (2022)
  • JEE Advanced 2021 Paper 2 Online (2021)

NEET Exams

  • NEET 2023 Manipur (2023)
  • NEET 2023 (2023)
  • NEET 2022 Phase 2 (2022)
  • NEET 2021 (2021)
  • NEET 2020 Phase 1 (2020)

BITSAT Exams

  • BITSAT 2022 (2022)
  • BITSAT 2021 (2021)
  • BITSAT 2020 (2020)

AIEEE Exams

  • AIEEE 2012 (2012)
  • AIEEE 2011 (2011)
  • AIEEE 2010 (2010)
  • AIEEE 2009 (2009)
